column5: Was wondering what guyz were going to opener this year!! Where ya staying! i'll be there with bells on staying at perfect view!
Could I get somebody to swing by and pick me up for this one?... pleeeeease???

Ya will swing by and pick you up Dog just send us the Lear jet and you can be in Quinte in no time.  I will be there again for my third tournament.  Fishing in a friends boat and will be staying at Bayside cottages.  I will be back on the long weekend in May staying at Mohawk Bay campground 4 days.  Now if only this snow would melt
Never miss opening on Quinte I will be staying at West Lake Willows Resort and launching out of Picton.  Best of fish'n for everyone on opener.  -sheldon
I'll be there, as I've been doing it for the last 5 years.  Saying I'm looking forward to it is an understatement!
I will be there, not sure where I am staying yet.. really depends on if the wife wants to come or not

I havnt gone home for openor in about 10 years. Probably wait till the lilacs come out, usually gets going then very good, 3rd week till 4th week. Going to be a late spawn so stick close to the rivermouths and pick off the abundant males that should be still in the area.
Leave a few for me boyz, I'll be heading down on the 16th for our annual 4 day trip.  We camp at Bass Cove park down by Adolphustown.

I'm going......I'll be staying at Cedar Point Resort in Hay Bay with our group of 10.  I think this will be my 7th or 8th year staying there...great place, great people.  With the late spawn, I'm thinking (hoping) a lot of fish will still be in the flats and Hay Bay area.  Good luck everyone.  Cheers
I know where I WONT be staying...   Lew do you have any additional info on where you camp??  G
Near us, Gerritt?  We're a great bunch
I am hoping to get out for the opening tournament. Have to play it by ear though.

Dilemma dilemma,  My last exam is on Monday May 5, the opener is on May 3rd.  Wow the opener is early this year. "To go or not to go, that is the question." Probably better plan to go during the week. YEAH! Im going fishing! (Sry, long winter)
LOL Legacy... no worries it is not you I was referring too  I hope to be able to get over there for a day or two.  G
I know.. I know.. lol  Have a great time guys.. I'll be doing the last minute boat rigging and headin North on the 11th. I'll do Quinte in November.. maybe.
Not me!  I'll be at the other end of the province
I'm already here so I might just have to put the boat out and enjoy some fishing.  Regards, Sam
~~~Buddy has a trailer at West Lake, say I can crash there, for the opener.
I'm goin. I go there each year. I usually drive there early in the evening. I start fishing at 12am around Desoronto .

Well i hope to be going with a few of our board members, percher & mike the pike,bill parker,and a few more, i used to do quinte opener for years,but i havnt for the last 8or so yrs....so it would be great this year to do it again !!! hope to see lots of members down there too....
We'll be there and staying at Bayview Resort in my trailer...  Fishing on Superdad and looking for big uns....  Wave and say hi on Ch 72.  Lotsa Luck.............
